repeat instead of making an single_crochet just make a slip_stitch into the 1st single_crochet made we have 12 15ch-spaces round #28 this round will be easy and boring we make 1 double_crochet into every chain and every single_crochet close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12* 15+1 = 12*16 double_crochet s round #29 time for another easy round make double_crochet s all around with two exceptions make 2 double_crochet a double_crochet-increase into every 4th and 12th stitch on each arc close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12* 16+2 = 12*18 double_crochet s magic carpet studio
